thread.title: AFL star Daniel Gorringe looks dapper as he marries girlfriend Ana Cannon in a stunning rural ceremony
thread.title_full: AFL star Daniel Gorringe looks dapper as he marries girlfriend Ana Cannon in a stunning rural ceremony

author: VNExplorer
title: AFL star Daniel Gorringe looks dapper as he marries girlfriend Ana Cannon in a stunning rural ceremony
text:
READ MORE: Daniel Gorringe set to come out of retirement for surprising gig
Daniel Gorringe has tied the knot with girlfriend Ana Cannon.
The former AFL player, 31, and Big Brother star shared the news to Instagram on Sunday, alongside two special images from the couple’s big day.
In the first picture, Daniel looks dashing in a sleek suit, white dress shirt and tie as he looks down at his ladylove, and wraps his arm around her waist.
Elsewhere, his blushing bride looks divine in an ethereal gown embellished with statement blooms.
Ana wore her brunette locks back on her special day and highlighted her delicate features with a subtle makeup palette.
Daniel Gorringe has tied the knot with girlfriend Ana Cannon. The former AFL player, 31, and Big Brother star shared the news to Instagram on Sunday, alongside two special images from the couple’s big day. Both pictured
In a second frame, the couple are seen with their backs to the camera in a rural setting, looking at a fireworks display
In a second frame, the couple are seen with their backs to the camera in a rural setting, looking at a fireworks display.
Ana captioned the memories simply.
‘It has always been you,’ she wrote alongside a love heart emoji.
The couple’s news was soon inundated with well wishes.
‘Sobbing,’ wrote Big Brother’s Sarah McDougal. ‘Stop it,’ added co-star Mat Garrick.
Another follower wrote: ‘This is the best wedding ever of the year.’
Gorringe proposed to Ana in November 2021.
Gorringe proposed to Ana in November 2021. Both pictured
‘On Friday I asked my best friend to marry me (for real this time). Here’s to forever loving you’, he wrote at the time.
Ana also shared a photo of the precious moment, in which she cuddles up to her man while holding a glass of Champagne and flaunting her ring.
She captioned it simply with a love heart and the date of the engagement, ‘19.02.21’.
He wrote: ‘On Friday I asked my best friend to marry me (for real this time). Here’s to forever loving you’. Ana also shared a photo of the precious moment, in which she cuddles up to her man while holding a glass of Champagne and flaunting her enormous diamond ring
So sweet! Ana clutched her face and cried out, ‘Oh my god!’ as she was presented with her ring
